newsitem.title: USA: Cyberonics issues shares for $6.8 million.
newsitem.headline: Cyberonics issues shares for $6.8 million.

text.p: Cyberonics Inc said on Tuesday it completed a round of private equity financing, raising $6.8 million in cash for newly issued non-registered common shares.
The company said it sold 1,534,374 shares for $4.4375 apiece in a self-managed private offering. Cyberonics shares were trading on the Nasdaq market Tuesday down 3/8 to 4-3/4.

Cyberonics said it now has adequate capital resources to begin developing its domestic sales and marketing infrastructure for its implantable NeuroCybernetic prosthesis product for the treatment of refractory epilepsy.
